chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:
According to UPS, there is no information about the package so I wanted to inquire
Thank you for your help,

Hello! 

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Feyza - Back Market

Hello! 

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours or this order will be refunded

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Feyza - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile,

The customer has correctly completed the certificate of non-receipt and entered the IMEI. 
The customer does not have the option of printing out the document. However, the electronic form is sufficient according to our guidelines. 

Please let us know within 24 hours if you have a replacement device. Otherwise the refund will be initiated.

Regards,
Feyza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

It is essential that the customer fills out the document by hand on physical paper and provides their signature. This measure is necessary to ensure the carrier's acceptance, as they have expressed concerns about potential fraud with digitally generated CNDs. Handwritten documentation on paper offers greater security against forgery. If you have any further inquiries or require additional assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out. 

Regards,
JH

Hello!

Handwritten CND and ID.

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours or this order will be refunded

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Feyza - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for providing us with the relevant documents. We will continue our investigation with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do NOT refund the customer.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

Do you have a replacement device in stock and have you shipped it to the customer? If you do not provide us with a valid tracking number within 24 hours, we will issue a refund.

Thank you.


Regards,
Feyza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
JH
